cnbc.title: South Korea grows 1.5% in fourth quarter, missing forecasts as domestic demand weakens
cnbc.summary: South Korea's economic growth slowed in the final quarter of last year amid weakening domestic demand as the impact from fiscal stimulus disspated.

cnbc.title: Trump floats idea to extend business tax break to homeowners
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump, speaking at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzlerland, floated the idea of allowing depreciation for personal residences.

cnbc.summary: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Wednesday advocated for a test of President Donald Trump's proposed credit card rate cap in Vermont and Massachusetts.
